message: For example, how do you intend to do the ones where you click on some random spot? That would be easy to do by accident with realtime 3d.
Do you have any plans for implementing the original riven easter eggs, and if so how? Or even adding your own easter eggs, like they did in realmyst?
For example, how do you intend to do the ones where you click on some random spot? That would be easy to do by accident with realtime 3d.
I think for obvious reasons we aren't going to divulge plans for easter eggs. They're hidden... like Easter eggs... :)
Are you at least going to have a spyder-type thing?
